Docs Live Preview

Silence

Bootstrap & Vue.js Admin Template

Live Preview

About

Silence admin template is a web dashboard application based on Bootstrap and Vue.js.

Silence is fully responsive single page dashboard template built with Bootstrap 3+, Vue.js and Vue Router. The theme is fully responsive, easy to customize, and the source code is clean. This template comes with a collection of easy to use components and widgets.

Vue.js

Vue is a progressive framework for building user interfaces. The core library is focused on the view layer only, and is easy to pick up and integrate with other libraries or existing projects.

Bootstrap

Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JS framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web. It's made for folks of all skill levels, devices of all shapes, and projects of all sizes.

Build Commands

All build commands are executed via NPM Scripts.

npm run dev

  • Webpack + vue-loader for single file Vue components.
  • State preserving hot-reload.
  • Lint-on-save with ESLint.
  • Source maps.

npm run build

  • JavaScript minified with UglifyJS.
  • HTML minified with html-minifier.
  • CSS across all components extracted into a single file and minified with cssnano.

npm run unit

  • Run unit tests in JSDOM with Jest.
  • Supports ES2015+ in test files.
  • Easy mocking.

Features

Built with vue-cli

SCSS source files

compiled CSS included

Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.

Javascript written using ES6

compiled JS included

ECMAScript 6, also known as ECMAScript 2015, is the latest version of the ECMAScript standard.

Webpack module bundler

Static module bundler for modern JS apps

When webpack processes your application, it recursively builds a dependency graph that includes every module your application needs, then packages all of those modules into one or more bundles.

Collapsible sidebar & Side Panel

Flexible modular code structure

NPM

Package Manager

NPM is the package manager for JavaScript and the world's largest software registry.

Responsive Charts

3 charts libraries

  • Chart.js - simple yet flexible JavaScript charting for designers & developers.
  • Peity - progressive svg pie, donut, bar and line mini charts.
  • Chartist - Simple responsive charts.
